review: It is good BUT I do not like the remote! ... I get double action, when I try and search I get extras of the same letter or number.. am always going to backspace!!!Also I do not like the FEEL of that remote.  I'm compairing it to ROKU remote, the ROKU remote is much better, sorry!The FIRE Stick is fine, works well, I'm satisfied with it.
